metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000015 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
phpMyAdmin 4.0, 4.4, and 4.6 are vulnerable to a CSS injection attackthrough crafted cookie parameters

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000015` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.5.4.1-2ubuntu2.1+esm6
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4:4.5.4.1-2ubuntu2.1+esm6').
